attributes.action: Make "life in prison" MEAN "life in prison".
attributes.additional_details:
Simple really! Make the sentence, which logically should be binding, mean it.

I'm only 17 but surely it's pretty clear to the nation that life means until the prisoner dies? 3 life sentences? Makes no sense.

We're told it's too expensive to do so; well cut back on things then - bread and water. But that's not what this petition is about.

Support what, logically, shouldn't even need to be discussed.
